summary: Comprehensive testing of CoinHubX crypto exchange platform completed. Main critical bugs from review request have been successfully fixed. P2P Express page now loads correctly without JSX errors, backend ObjectId serialization issues resolved, and wallet balance APIs working properly.

ui_bugs.issue: JavaScript error: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'charAt')

integration_issues.issue: After successful login, dashboard elements not immediately visible

resolved_issues.issue: FIXED - No longer showing blank with 'refresh page' errors
FIXED - No more 500 errors from ObjectId serialization

passed_tests: Portfolio dashboard API (£13,549 value check passed)
Wallet balances API (GBP and BTC balances found)
Live prices API (BTC: £65,589, ETH prices working)
P2P Express currencies and liquidity check
P2P Express page loads without errors
P2P Express displays live price and purchase form
Swap page loads with functional elements
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix TransactionHistory component JavaScript error in WalletPage.js (line ~155107: Cannot read properties of undefined reading 'charAt'). Consider adding null checks for transaction_type field. Minor: Add missing referral settings and admin platform stats endpoints.
